message: Let's be fair, Bob. I'm offering you 40$ to start.
I think I deserve a bit more, 55-45 is still quite fair
Bob, my friend, let's be reasonable. This is the same split you wanted last round, but time is money! It's better for both of us to settle now.
You said time is money, but it seems like time is costing you more than me. I'll take a bit more, thanks!
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  Let's just split it down the middle and call it a day. 50/50.
You're feeling the pinch of inflation, I'm not. My patience is wearing thin, but my wallet isn't. 60-40 is my new offer.
